title: 72/275. International Association of Permanent Representatives to the United Nations

paragraphs.2: Recognizes the important role played by the Association and its positive contribution to the activity of the Organization through the promotion of better interpersonal connectedness and a climate of trust and openness, as well as the exchange of good practices and experience;
paragraphs.3: Invites the States Members of the United Nations to support the work of the Association and encourage the participation of former and current permanent representatives to the United Nations in the events and forums of the Association;
paragraphs.4: Authorizes the Secretary-General to continue to provide the Association, from within existing resources, with facilities on a non-remuneration basis and to replace its current office with a more suitable space to enable the Association to convene its meetings;
paragraphs.5: Calls upon the Secretary-General to provide the Association with a separate web page, to be hosted on the delegates section of the United Nations web site, with content provided by the Association and updated from time to time with information on its recent activities;
paragraphs.6: Authorizes the use by the Association of the United Nations emblem alongside the emblem of the Association, provided that guidelines for the use thereof are followed.
